fragrance1.name: Pineapple Glacier
fragrance1.description: Refreshing blend of tropical pineapple and zesty citrus

fragrance2.name: Stars Et Oud
fragrance2.description: Mysterious combination of celestial scents and rich oud

fragrance3.name: Nuit d'Orleans
fragrance3.description: A captivating fragrance that evokes the magic of jazz in New Orleans

fragrance4.name: Ethereal Diorama
fragrance4.description: A dreamy scent that transports you to a world of fantasy and wonder

fragrance5.name: Milano
fragrance5.description: An elegant fragrance inspired by the timeless beauty of Milan

fragrance6.name: Atmospheric Diamond
fragrance6.description: A luxurious scent that captures the brilliance of a sparkling diamond
fragrance6.heart: Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Lily of the Valley

fragrance7.description: A fragrance that pays homage to the opulence and grandeur of the 19th century

fragrance8.name: Marseille
fragrance8.description: A refreshing blend that captures the essence of the Mediterranean coast

fragrance9.name: Love's Golden Hour
fragrance9.description: A warm and romantic fragrance that celebrates the magic of golden moments

fragrance10.name: Lion's Heart
fragrance10.description: A bold and majestic fragrance that embodies strength and courage

fragrance11.name: 1819 Revolution
fragrance11.description: A revolutionary scent that ignites the spirit of change and innovation

fragrance12.name: Brazilian Vibes
fragrance12.description: Experience the vibrant energy of Brazil with 'Brazilian Vibes': a lively fusion of tropical fruits and exotic florals.

fragrance13.name: Brooklyn
fragrance13.description: Embark on a journey through the streets of Brooklyn with 'Brooklyn': a bold and eclectic blend that captures the essence of urban life.

fragrance14.name: Desire's Dream
fragrance14.description: Indulge in the allure of 'Desire's Dream': a captivating fragrance that ignites the senses and stirs the soul.

fragrance15.name: Love In You
fragrance15.description: Celebrate the essence of love with 'Love In You': a romantic and enchanting fragrance that envelops you in a warm embrace.
fragrance15.heart: Rose, Jasmine, Lily of the Valley

fragrance16.name: Noir Francois
fragrance16.description: Unleash your mysterious side with 'Noir Francois': a seductive and enigmatic fragrance that captivates the senses.

fragrance17.name: Obscene Obsession
fragrance17.description: Explore the depths of desire with 'Obscene Obsession': an intoxicating fragrance that pushes the boundaries of sensuality.

fragrance18.name: Serene Embrace
fragrance18.description: Find tranquility in 'Serene Embrace': a peaceful and soothing fragrance that envelops you in a comforting aura.

fragrance19.name: After Hours
fragrance19.description: A captivating scent perfect for late-night adventures. After Hours blends warm vanilla and spicy amber with hints of citrus and musk, creating an alluring fragrance that lingers long after the party ends.

fragrance20.name: Algerian Dunes
fragrance20.description: Inspired by the vast desert landscape, Algerian Dunes evokes the essence of freedom and exploration. This fragrance combines earthy patchouli and cedarwood with fresh bergamot and spicy cardamom, creating a harmonious blend that transports you to the heart of the desert.

fragrance21.name: Fifth Avenue
fragrance21.description: Fifth Avenue captures the essence of sophistication and elegance. This timeless fragrance opens with vibrant citrus notes, leading to a floral heart of rose and jasmine, while the base of sandalwood and amber provides a warm and luxurious finish.

fragrance22.name: Carrara
fragrance22.description: Named after the famous Carrara marble, this fragrance exudes refinement and luxury. Carrara combines the freshness of citrus with the richness of cedarwood and musk, creating a sophisticated and timeless scent that leaves a lasting impression.

fragrance23.name: Galactic Musk
fragrance23.description: Embark on a celestial journey with Galactic Musk, a captivating fragrance that transports you to distant galaxies. This cosmic scent blends ethereal musk with sparkling citrus and exotic spices, creating a mesmerizing olfactory experience.

fragrance24.name: Imperial Orchid
fragrance24.description: Imperial Orchid exudes opulence and allure, inspired by the rare and exotic flower. This luxurious fragrance combines the intoxicating scent of orchids with velvety vanilla and sensual musk, creating a captivating aroma that commands attention.

fragrance25.name: Only Hour
fragrance25.description: Capturing the fleeting beauty of twilight, Only Hour is a romantic and enchanting fragrance. Delicate floral notes mingle with warm amber and creamy sandalwood, evoking the magical moments as day transitions to night.

fragrance26.name: Royal Velvetine
fragrance26.description: Fit for royalty, Royal Velvetine is a luxurious fragrance that exudes regal elegance. Rich spices and precious woods mingle with velvety roses and creamy vanilla, creating a scent that is both opulent and captivating.

fragrance27.name: Sicilian Oud
fragrance27.description: Sicilian Oud captures the essence of Sicily's sun-drenched landscapes and rich cultural heritage. This sophisticated fragrance blends smoky oud with zesty citrus and aromatic spices, creating a scent that is both exotic and alluring.

fragrance28.name: Skyline Symphony
fragrance28.description: Embark on a sensory journey through the world's most iconic cities with Skyline Symphony. This captivating fragrance captures the essence of urban landscapes, blending crisp citrus with aromatic herbs and woody notes, creating a symphony of scent that celebrates the vibrancy of city life.

fragrance29.name: Twilight Princess
fragrance29.description: Twilight Princess is a fragrance fit for fairy tales and enchanted realms. This magical scent combines delicate florals with sweet fruits and warm woods, creating a captivating aroma that enchants the senses and sparks the imagination.
